attributes.action: Stop Murdock'n'Sky changing British Culture for the Worse
attributes.additional_details:
Murdock et al. & Sky TV & Fox TV are influencing British Culture for the worse. The very worse. Gone is the unique Britishness; replaced by brash profit focussed trash pandering to the lowest common demometer.

For example: Premier Football, Reality TV, Reactionary News coverage, Formula One (F1)...
